verses.verse: Unless <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1129>builds<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> they <S%H5998>labor<s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%> who <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H3068>it.<s%> Unless Yahweh <S%H8104>watches<s%> over the <S%H5892>city,<s%> the <S%H8104>watchman<s%> <S%H8245>guards<s%> it in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>

It is <S%H7723>vain<s%> for you to rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H7925>early,<s%> to stay <S%H3427>up<s%> <S%H309>late,<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H6089>toil;<s%> for he <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H8142>sleep<s%> to his loved <S%H3039>ones.<s%>
<S%H1121>Behold,<s%> children are a <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H990>womb<s%> is his <S%H7939>reward.<s%>
As <S%H2671>arrows<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a mighty <S%H1368>man,<s%> so are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

<S%H835>Happy<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> who has his <S%H827>quiver<s%> <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H954>them.<s%> They won't be disappointed when they <S%H1696>speak<s%> with their <S%H341>enemies<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>
